name: Gunther`s Adventure
description:
Embark on a journey to kill the evil that has taken root outside of your doorstep with your trusty axe and shotgun.

This was the first gamejam by a team of 3 students in video game programming. 

Made by : Guillaume Bernier, Tommy Donnelly and Nicolas Poulin

With the participation of Karol-Ann Champagne.

Assets Used:

Gunther :https://hugues-laborde.itch.io/cartoon-viking-character-pack

Skeleton:https://jesse-m.itch.io/skeleton-pack

Boss:https://lionheart963.itch.io/sorcerer-villain

Environment:

https://vnitti.itch.io/taiga-asset-pack

https://vnitti.itch.io/glacial-mountains-parallax-background

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/medieval-pixel-art-asset-free-130131

Music: 

Middle Age - Medieval Action Sound FX Pack by MarioBastos (only obtainable on older Unity version)

https://soundcloud.com/muzstation-game-music/the-last-stand-preview

https://soundcloud.com/rediron_lloyd/sets/rpg-puzzle-game-music-pack
